net.sourceforge.barcodegen.views

Class PreviewWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.barcodegen.views.PreviewWindow

  • public class PreviewWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Divish on 2014-08-08. Display label previews for A whole Job (many Orders) Accepts list of jobs from Jobs.previewJob Stitched all AWs of one serial into one image
